issue.title: [Java] JDBC-to-Arrow Conversion: JDBC Metadata in Schema Fields
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3966](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3966). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This feature extends ARROW-3965 and adds a new option to include JDBC metadata in the Arrow Schema Field Metadata.  To start, the following items are added:
 \* Catalog Name
 \* Table Name
 \* Column Name
 \* Column Type Name

These are configured by setting the "Include Metadata" boolean flag on the configuration object.  If the value is set to _true_, the above fields will be added.  Otherwise, they will not.
